_sText:
It's finally here! The finished iteration of my map bhop_Zelda.

Thank you everyone for your support!

I started this map around two years ago, never got to finishing it until now. Since then it's beta has been leaked and I lost motivation to finish. But after a while I realized that I shouldn't let that stop me.

Is this map worth replacing the beta on your server? While the length of the map is pretty much the same it features bug fixes, soundscapes, an end room, a bonus, and extra, completed content that adds to the quality and enjoy-ability of the map.

It's not perfect, but this is the completed vision I had for bhop_Zelda.

I decided not to use NES Zelda songs for the soundscapes. I felt that the original NES songs are slightly annoying for a looped soundscape; so I used songs from Twilight Princess, Majora's Mask, A Link Between Worlds, and The Wind Waker. I found that they are more pleasant to listen to for 5-10 minutes as you play the stages.

The bonus is decently challenging, but very long. It will be hard to speedrun, but I wanted something that felt rewarding to complete. Good luck getting good times on it!

Special thanks to Guadalupe, my mentor, motivator, and inspiration. I've learned a lot from you and I appreciate all the time you give me.

And also bhop_Alex. For annoying me over and over to finish bhop_Zelda. Seriously, this completed version of bhop_Zelda may have never happened if you had not shown me so much support.

Thanks to everyone who downloads, plays, supports, and hates my map. I love to create for the bhop community and I love you all.

Most textures I made myself.Some sounds were taking from the actual Zelda games.
Lost Woods Dubstep - Ephixa
Some Zelda related images I found on google.

Ps. The doors will kill you if they close on you in SP mode. GOTTA GO FASTE
